---
name: Onboarding Template
about: To guide new students within the omis gazette
title: Onboarding
labels: documentation
assignees: ''

---

Onboarding Tasks 

- [ ] Have access to the Github for the gazette
- [ ] Introduction to [Github](https://github.com/skills/introduction-to-github)
- [ ] Communicate using [markdown](https://github.com/skills/communicate-using-markdown)
- [ ] GitHub Pages [Learning Lab](https://github.com/skills/github-pages) 
- [ ] Read through all the Wiki pages
- [ ] Request access to Flipgrid
- [ ] Watch Flipgrid videos https://flipgrid.com/6b0d05bf

Continue to build your knowledge by learning the skills offered in [Github](https://skills.github.com/)

***
- [ ] Publish first content-based issue
- [ ] Build OMIS gazette locally from a working branch
- [ ] Make changes, [push](https://github.com/git-guides/git-push) & [pull](https://github.com/git-guides/git-pull)
- [ ] [Create a pull request](https://docs.github.com/en/pull-requests/collaborating-with-pull-requests/proposing-changes-to-your-work-with-pull-requests/creating-a-pull-request)
- [ ] [Reviewing pull requests](https://github.com/skills/review-pull-requests)
- [ ] [Linking a pull request to an issue](https://docs.github.com/en/issues/tracking-your-work-with-issues/linking-a-pull-request-to-an-issue#about-linked-issues-and-pull-requests)
- [ ] [Resolve merge conflicts](https://github.com/skills/resolve-merge-conflicts)

***
- [ ] Install ruby gems (follow `wiki` instructions)
- [ ] Install [vscode](https://code.visualstudio.com/Download)
- [ ] Install [Github desktop](https://desktop.github.com/)
- [ ] watch the omisgazette repository (click on the watch on the very top)

***
- [ ] set up [clockify](https://app.clockify.me/en/login) for time tracing
- [ ] set up [google voice number](https://voice.google.com/u/0/about) (work number) then add info to the Wiki `directory` page
